website_summaries.verdict: Recognized for their affordable pricing and high ratings, these simple pants are great for leisurely water sporting.
pros: Showcases supreme comfort with a snug, stretching fit
Many customers use these pants for paddling and kayaking
High waist keeps pants in place
cons: A few customers complained of the fabric smelling strange

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for Stand up padding, I love them! The are not too thick, fit perfect and super comfortable! I chose the 1.5mm, X-small. I'm 5'3" approx 104lbs. they fit similar to athletic leggings, keep my legs warm on cold days on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pants
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9 157lbs, athletic build. I got the large and they fit perfect. I bought them for Chattajack, a 31 mile SUP race. It was going to be in the 30's in the morning and I was concerned about the cold. These pants were PERFECT. My lower body was not cold at all. When I did get wet, my skin didn't feel it. I bought a high neoprene sock to go over the ankles...I couldn't have been happier with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding bargain! I wear an 8-10 pants and ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding bargain! I wear an 8-10 pants and ordered a large, which is the appropriate size. I have bigger hips, so if you are a taller, slimmer 8, order a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Wigglesworth

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for style, fit, function, and value
customer_reviews.text: The wetsuit pants fit great. I ordered a small and they were as described. I used them often over the bottoms of my 2 piece and one piece suits to keep my legs warm in the ocean and in pools. The black color coordinated with all my suits. They are easy to wash and are fast drying. I ordered a different brand wetsuit top to pair with them and they looked great together.
customer_reviews.author: DMKS

customer_reviews.title: Good for warm diving ,just a little short
customer_reviews.text: Good quality neoprene. I will be using them to dive warm waters locally. I needed something less than my 3mm full wet suit in 85 degree waters but more than just free diving. It will still provide protection from the sun, jellyfish and fire coral, without overheating. My only complaint is that they are shorter than the picture makes you believe. They are like capris, which is still fine and will do the job, just different than I expected. Overall still great though.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a xxl because I have a large hind end. Those were so very large, I returned and got a pair of large. I wore them on a kayak trip to Lake Mead where the weather was going to be in the 60-70’s and the water temp was 62. I really loved these as I could get in the water with light freezing and they kept the sun off my legs. If I didn’t get them wet, they could get quite hit though. Easy to just walk into the water and they they kept me at a comfortable temperature (warmed me or cooled me off!)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pants for kayaking in Banff and on the Upper Missouri River
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pants anticipating the ice cold waters of Lake Louise and I am so glad I did! I accidentally let my kayak slip back into the lake and had to swim after it in the glacial melt of the lake. This incident proved very amusing to the tourists who were snapping photos of my mishap! Additionally, as we followed the Lewis and Clark Trail we were inundated with hail and sleet... these pants were the best purchase I made for this trip! Thanks to all of the team who created them!
customer_reviews.author: Mighty Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Kayak approved!
customer_reviews.text: Have worn these twice with kayaking and so far I love them! They’re comfortable and flexible. I can easily bend my knees while kayaking. I’m able to walk into water comfortably. I’m 5’0 and about 125-130. I originally ordered the medium and then ordered the small. I actually prefer the small (more snug fit. The mediums were too long and baggy behind the knees). I’m in the PNW and the pants made it comfortable to walk In the chilly PNW waters!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I get cold quick even in Hawaii waters. My husband bought this for me it work great. I stayed warm and my legs did not get scratched on any rocks or coral. My family commented on how long I stayed in the ocean. I am 155 and 5'9" I usually get medium based on previous reviews I ordered a large- fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: Donna F

customer_reviews.title: I found sizing to be correct.
customer_reviews.text: I received a pair of wetpants as a gift, but asked the buyer to order size XXL when I'd normally take L or XL (I'm 5'10"/200, pant size 36W/30L) as I thought these would be cut small like most Asian-made clothing. Mine turned out to be a bit large (loose fitting and long,) but OK for my purposes (prone paddling.) I bought another pair for a lady friend, ordering her normal size M, and they fit her perfectly (she's 5'4"/125.) In other aspects, I really like the product. I was very comfortable in 60 degree water. The cut and construction is good quality, and other paddlers have expressed interest in getting their own.
customer_reviews.author: Lawdawg

customer_reviews.title: Warm, too long on me to be safe.
customer_reviews.text: These certainly made the chilly ocean much more comfortable to wade in on our late September vacation, however I'm not sure they would be great for any actual swimming. Walking in shallow water was like having lead weights tied to my lower legs, perhaps because I'm so short so I had a lot of bunched up material but I cant be sure. The drag was intense and I worried if it felt like that it I tried to swim I wouldn't be able to swim for long.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaGee

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: First, I am 5’8’’ and 155lbs, I usually wear a size 10 in pants. I am a hour glass shape, curvy, with muscular legs. These wet suit pants fit great. I bought a size large. They were long enough for my legs ( I am usually in between a long and regular pant). Have great mobility. They look great on!!! The only thing was they are a little loose around my ankles, but I have small ankles anyway so no biggie. Hope this helps ya’ll. I recommend them. I just might purchase another myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fit and comfort are great! I swim in these about 4 times a ...
customer_reviews.text: The fit and comfort are great! I swim in these about 4 times a week at the YMCA..they don't last very long,a couple of months..the fabric breaks down in the seat and crotch from all the pulling and tugging to get them on..they need to fit snug..the fabric separates in the middle construction and rolls up..I keep buying them because they are sooo comfortable..you do have to let them air out for about 2 weeks when new to get rid of the chemical smell..I buy them ahead of time and hang them in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appearance, quality materals and stitching.
customer_reviews.text: The extra small is a snug fit compared to "normal" clothing but not difficult to pull on and off. I am 5' 3" and under 100 pounds. I paired it with a size 4 "Lemorecn Women’s 1.5mm Wetsuits Jacket Long Sleeve Neoprene Top," and it is a perfect color match. I think the red stitching in these pants is really more like a dark pink, but it is hard to tell, it coordinates nicely with the black, blue, red and rose top.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Jaynes

customer_reviews.title: 5’4 165# ordered XL. fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’4”. 165#. 34-35-40. At the naval I measure 37 inches. Ruler type body style. I have zero definition in my waist. Ordered xl. Fits perfect. Not too tight. Not to loose. Seems very well made with plenty of stretch. For the price I am highly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Warm and dry
customer_reviews.text: These pants are just wonderful. I wore them during a 34 mile canoe paddling marathon race in wet whether and cold temperatures. After four hours my legs were warm and dry! Fit may be a little tight. I bought a size up and they were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Kikis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, goes through the wash
customer_reviews.text: Not really red -- more of a pink color. I wear these scuba diving in the warm Caribbean with a long sleeve rash guard. They add little buoyancy but do the trick of protecting my legs from stings or abrasions. When the first arrive I thought they looked impossibly small but I found them easy to get on with a lot of stretch. If you are a diver, you know how difficult it is to put on a single piece wet suit. These dry overnight when I am on a trip. When I get home, I throw these in the washing machine and the come out just fine. I now have two pair!
customer_reviews.author: L. Speed

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7 and weigh around 150. I ordered a large and they fit perfect. I only bought these so I could clean my pool before we close it and while of course you can feel the water, it is so much better than being in cold water in a regular suit. Who knows maybe I'll be more adventurous since I have them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, thank you ladies! I am a 16, I ordered 3XL and it’s a perfect fit. I probably could have done 2XL. I don’t like muffin top, so all good. Buy them! Super deal
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hanford

customer_reviews.title: Just put them on and they feel great. Not as snug as my full wet suit ...
customer_reviews.text: Just put them on and they feel great. Not as snug as my full wet suit but I’m using these for kayaking so I can use a little more room. Look cute too! I bought large and I’m 5’7” and 155 lbs. I’m ready for cold water sea kayaking (I wear a spray skirt and dry top so these won’t get wet like white water but I will be in the water to launch.).
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stretchy.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice lightweight neoprene tights. At 1.5mm they aren’t made for the coldest water, but are great for a layer of insulation to be able to snorkel longer (I didn’t wear mine diving, just snorkeling, but imagine they’d perform similarly). There was no waist gapping and they stayed out. There is lots of stretch to the fabric and I think they’ll work well for sailing and paddle boarding too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: I love to ocean kayak on tidal wetlands and my legs get very wet when I paddle. I easily become hypothermic, so I needed something to keep my legs warm. At the same time, I'm claustrophobic and hate tight clothes. These pants are perfect! They are very comfortable to wear, and kept me completely warm. I couldn't be happier with them! (Bear in mind that I wear these in SoCal on tidal wetlands where the water is several degrees warmer than open ocean. So these may not be heavy enough in really cold water.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You better be tiny
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good but the size L is way too small. Really had to struggle to get it on and I am normally a 12 to 14 in bottoms. I substituted the men's XL and it fits just fine, although long in the leg.
customer_reviews.author: sun&wind

customer_reviews.title: The length was perfect and it fit very snuggle
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2, 125 lbs and this fit very well! The length was perfect and it fit very snuggle. I wore this hiking in The Narrows in the fall where I found myself waist deep in freezing cold water. The material is thick enough so you'll only feel fairly cold in freezing water instead of freezing cold, so if you want to stay warm in cold water, look for a thicker pant.
customer_reviews.author: skylit

customer_reviews.title: Best buy ever!!
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best buys that I ever made. I wore them snorkeling in November in deep & shallow waters off the coast of Maui & swimming in cold waters under waterfalls along the Hana road. They fit perfect & are very comfortable. I am 5'2" & 150 & bought large... my weight kind of goes up & down so I am thinking about ordering another pair in medium these are large, very roomy I think sometimes too much but very comfortable. I also use them here along the Gulf Coast & in my pool. So can get in the waters earlier & also later in the season without being cold.Great price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Em W

customer_reviews.title: nice in between option
customer_reviews.text: fit nicely, nice for those inbetween water days that are too cold for a spring suit but too hot for a wetsuit. nice to be able to mix and match with a thermal top or wetsuit top. doesn't come off in the water and pretty comfortable. good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Valeena

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these in water, so I cannot test if they stretch when wet nor attest to their warmth. However, the dry fit is perfect and they are comfortable enough to wear for hours in their dry state. I am most pleased with my purchase so far! I did pay more attention to height than weight when selecting my size. I hope this is helpful to know. You must check their sizing charts!
customer_reviews.author: SummerDays

customer_reviews.title: Kept my legs warm
customer_reviews.text: Pretty dang good, I'd say. Wore to a massive kayak event that involved copious amounts of drinking, so sloppy kayakers tipped my vessel a few times, into cold water. These really helped keep my legs warm. They dried off quick when out of water and kept me warm when in. Form fitting while being comfy. Pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Bielecki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these and I just love them. They are the perfect neoprene pants for warm water diving and they protect your legs from the underwater environment. The price was perfect and the maneuverability is excellent. I am 5’7 145lbs and Large fit me perfectly! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne R

customer_reviews.title: ok - size wasn't right for me
customer_reviews.text: sizing just didn't work for a short person like me. I'm a 32 waist and fit an XL waist-wise, but i'm 5'-0". Had to fold the ankles over and that let's all the water in. besides that, thick neoprene like a wetsuit, so I would've liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Love these wetsuit pants!
customer_reviews.text: Love these wet suit pants for teaching water aerobics in super cold water. Makes jumping into the icy water bearable. Will definitely be taking these to the jersey shores with me this summer, so I can stand to go into the cold water with my grand kids. Normally wear a medium, and ordered a medium. Good fit. Keeps legs warm in cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but somewhat large order your regular size not need to go up in size.
customer_reviews.text: feel good but it is somewhat large . but the material seems great will see when goes into the water order your regular size, I am 5ft 9inc and 155 lbs order large it is too big next time will order my regular size M,
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great neoprene pants!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to hike the Narrows, a very cold river in Zion canyon. They kept me extremely warm in the freezing water and fit great. You have to buy these at this price point. My girlfriend had a similar pair from a different brand for that cost three times the price and kept me just as warm.
customer_reviews.author: K. Massi

customer_reviews.title: These fit great, but they do smell funny <like a rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, but they do smell funny <like a rubber tire>. I haven't tried them out in the water yet, so I'll update my review once I have.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: Good quality purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These pants kept me warm and looked good. I do wish the elastic band at the top was a little wider and flatter so it wouldn’t cut in to my softness. But they did the job. I am 5’2” and around 150lbs, the large fits well. I was glad to have them in the cool waters. I walked probably 3-4 miles in these multiple different times and they are still holding up great. No piling on the insides of the thighs!! Definitely worth the money. My husband has the same ones in the men’s.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah H.

customer_reviews.title: Dive! Dive! Dive!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Follow the size charts. For reference, I am an hourglass 5'5, 165 fit female with full booty and thighs. I purchased the large, and they fit perfectly. They are easy to pull up and get on. They do not bunch (on me). Length is just right. Waist feels good. Great pair of dive pants when you don't want to don the full wetsuit in warm weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 60 degree water temp
customer_reviews.text: I wore these pants for 7 days while paddling an inflatable kayak on the Salmon River in Idaho. Water temps were around 60 degrees/air temps close to 100. I was never too warm or too cold. Simply the perfect pant when paired with a long sleeve, swim shirt. Fit was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and made well!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2" and 36" hips and I ordered a small and they fit great and are made well. I did order the red color stitching but what arrived was the purple stitching in a bag labeled red. I liked the purple color just fine so I decided to keep them anyway. I will be using these for diving and other water sports.
customer_reviews.author: jmbet

customer_reviews.title: Unless you are a tiny woman I suggest purchasing the men's version of these great pants. They are really warm and comfy and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5'7" 150 lb. Woman and purchased these in an XL (the biggest size offered) They were WAY TOO SMALL! So I purchased the men's XXL (the biggest size offered) and they fit perfectly! These XL's will fit my athletic 5'3" 110lb. Daughter just right. Unless you are a tiny woman I suggest purchasing the men's version of these great pants. They are really warm and comfy and pretty cute on! You sure can't beat the price! Here is the link for the men's version. DIVE & SAIL Men's Wetsuit Pants 1.5mm Neoprene Diving Snorkeling Scuba Surf Canoe Pants, Grey Trim, XX-Large
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime-Aholic

customer_reviews.title: Great pants! Order 1 size up.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and looks great! I'm 5'6", 120 lbs, usually wear US pant size 2 or 4 - I ordered size M.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they were torn. Really liked them.
customer_reviews.text: I had thought about returning them after I tried on. Then I I see two perfect tears. This was really was very bad on the handlers behalf because they were not careful unpackaging the pants. It looks exactly. Like rip from a unpackingbknife going thru the plastic to the pants .
customer_reviews.author: Norma Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Love these, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable I can wear the L and the M, went with the smaller size since it is supposed to stretch some when it gets wet, I'm 5'3" normally wear 8/10 and 150.bs
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Dad

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for kayaking, white water rafting, wake boarding, and paddle boarding. Very comfy to move in and kept the sun off my skin. Also kept me warm in colder water.
customer_reviews.author: honore200

customer_reviews.title: Runs small? Nice pants
customer_reviews.text: 5'6", 165lbs, 32" waist, 41" hips, normally wear a size 12 pant. I ordered XXL and they are snug (like workout pants) but fit comfortably above the knees, maybe a little baggy below my knees. Can't wait to try them out on the water when it gets cooler.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I got a size Large. Fits great. I purchased them to work out in in order to promote sweating and detoxing. I would like a XL but, I only saw Large as the biggest size.
customer_reviews.author: A.R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice neoprene pants for this price.  A great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6", 165 lbs and a medium fits GREAT. These are really nice neoprene pants for this price. A great deal.
customer_reviews.author: EbbyTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: These are such a good buy that it is a no brainer. Well made and true to size. Actually pretty easy to pull on. Can't wait to use these. Perfect for water sports.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Not for curves.
customer_reviews.text: These pants seem fairly sturdy. I'm 5'4" around 145-150#. I have curves and thick thighs. On me, they fit right in the waist but too tight in the hips and thighs and way to loose below the calf. The pic I posted shows how loose they are below the calf. Other than the fit, they are ok.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: These worked great for snorkel pants
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for snorkel pants. They are very stinky when you get them though and took a few times in the water before they stopped smelling. They fit true to size. They are higher wasted which is good so they don't roll down like some of the other brands. The quality is great too! Just the smell was strong so I will give them a 4 stars for that, but maybe that is just how neoprene is!
customer_reviews.author: SYD

customer_reviews.title: Extreme smell
customer_reviews.text: Good value ... but the pants smell really strong. I have other neoprene wear and have not noticed such an extreme odor.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably dry and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love these neoprene leggings! I bought them to use when I Kayak. They are perfect. I worried about the size, as sometimes I need a large, sometimes medium. Reviews were all over the place on sizing. I ordered a meduim and they were perfect. I'm 5'7" about 140 lbs. Really a great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these pants!
customer_reviews.text: These pants are amazing! Fit perfect-I'm 5'2"/118lbs and the small is a great fit. We went paddleboarding in the ocean in 40 degree weather. Kept me warm and was very comfortable with movement. Could not be happier with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: mommanich

customer_reviews.title: Get these if you want to kayak year round!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 3mm wetsuit pant first and returned them due to feeling like I had a layer of blubber wrapped around my legs! Bought these next and they were perfect! I am a size 10 and got the large ones. They are not too thick for my kayaking activities in 40-45 degree weather; they kept me quite comfortable. I haven’t been in any colder temps than that. Paired with water boots I waded around and stayed dry. At this price, I am buying another pair and recommending them to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: shelley m.

customer_reviews.title: A hit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my friend for beach/surf play. She loves them. 5' 7'', 135lbs and the medium fits just right
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size small fits my 5ft 3 size 4/6 figure great. Haven't used them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Great kayaking pants!
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect fit. Figure flattering and great for kayaking. Size runs true to what you normally would wear for leggings. Wear these kayaking. I bought black with hot pink , very nice.
customer_reviews.author: BallardGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My height is 5 3 as you can tell i am a very curvy lady these fit fantastic !I got an extra large. They fit perfectly. Can't wait to use them on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Medium for 5ft 120lb
customer_reviews.text: Medium fits well for a 5ft 120lb woman with thickish thighs.
customer_reviews.author: NTN

customer_reviews.title: I need another pair!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! We kayak early morning when weather conditions are chilly -these pants are perfect! Bought a size M - I'm 5'4" 145-fit like a pair of leggings only thicker. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Great pants! A tad bit short.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and nice stretch. I use them to work out and they are fantastic to promote sweat and keep muscles warm. Took off one star bc they are about 1-2 inches too short. I’m 5’8” 150 pounds. Ordered a large which is a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: TLG

customer_reviews.title: Great Pants!
customer_reviews.text: Originally wore under my shorty when I SCUBA. Tried one day without the shorty since the water was so warm and I was very comfortable. Being so thin, it will stretch a little, but that didn't cause any issues. I am short & squat, with a few extra pounds. I ordered a large and it fit great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bette

customer_reviews.title: Previously I wore a full wetsuit in the Narrows but that seemed like overkill in August although at 6am in the shadows ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear in the Narrows (Zion National Park). Previously I wore a full wetsuit in the Narrows but that seemed like overkill in August although at 6am in the shadows that water is cold. Just having the pants really paid off, kept me warm in the morning but didn't make me overheat on the way out.
customer_reviews.author: Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about the quality given the price and off brand-ness of these but was pleasantly surprised. I'm 6'0 tall and 170 lbs and the large fit fine. Kept me warm on a relatively cooler summer day windsurfing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits snug, thick material
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy but I have a really small build so I had to buy the women's one. I'm 5'3" and 106 lbs and got the X small. It fits great. I'll update this review once I get a chance to swim with it. Also the red trim is obviously pink and not red.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Runs short
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5, 115 lbs and got a small. Waist and hips fit right but too short. I wear my diving boots with the pants but my feet get wet still.
customer_reviews.author: EmmeKay

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4", 112-115lbs, 28 waist, 34 hips and it fit very snug but I could still breathe normally. I haven't tried it in water yet, but it feels like it will keep me warm if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Held up great for a Spartan Beast!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to wear during a Spartan Race Beast (13+ miles in rain and mud). I needed something that was comfortable and flexible. This worked great. It also kept me warm. I slid down a couple mountain sides and over rocks/sticks and other painful items and it held up great. No rips/holes. I would def recommend. I look forward to wearing this for dives as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,  no tug, good fit, flattering
customer_reviews.text: Good for kayaking, diving or swimming. I ordered size M. I am 5'6" and weight 122 lbs, with 37" hip. Fit is perfect. Flattering. Better than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Down2Earth

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: These pants were really comfortable and great for kayaking. Some of the other description reviews mention a velcro at the waist, these do not have it.
customer_reviews.author: PJD

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality and warm but sizing is off. I ordered a med, it fits like a small. Don't want to return because I don't want to put more money into it through shipping
customer_reviews.author: rainberry

customer_reviews.title: Order your size or smaller
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wetsuit pants, but I ordered one size larger, and found that they fall off too often.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Fits full figure
customer_reviews.text: Most importantly it fits and I am a size 18w. It has a tendency to slide down due to my larger bottom. However it does have seepage; not sure if that’s normal for 1.5mm I own a 3mm high end suit and it’s now starting to leak after 3 years. I use it for outdoors water aerobics and it is cold upon initial entry. I guess it’s worth the money. Would invest in a better suit next time.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to put on, but snug enough to help with body temp. Not sure about durability since I haven't used them in open water. Light enough to fit in my carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Brice98

customer_reviews.title: Good protection in a great style
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly because it runs to size with good proportions and a classic style. Sturdy material offering good protection.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: Size Small. 5'7" 129lbs. Great fit. Originally ordered Med. based on size chart, fit with gaping areas not snug. If in between sizes, go smaller. Intend to use for keeping legs warm while snorkeling and kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: John Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful reasonable pants
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants........comfee in the water and flexible..........I wind surf and these pant work well in Florida all through the fall..........plus great price
customer_reviews.author: Anne A

customer_reviews.title: Length and waist is a great fit. Will rinse before use as some reviewers ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was so quick. I'm 5 ft 1/2" and 102 lbs. length. Waist is 26". Length and waist is a great fit. Will rinse before use as some reviewers mentioned they got a rash. Pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Wifey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Oh So Handy
customer_reviews.text: These were great! I’m 5’8’’ and 135ish, and the mediums were perfect. I wore them to get baptized in the Jordan river in December, and they kept me warm!
customer_reviews.author: eclairez

customer_reviews.title: these seem great. Just like a wetsuit but the bottoms only
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know about these pants. these seem great. Just like a wetsuit but the bottoms only. the 1.5mm is pretty thick and warm. I ordered a medium i am 5'3 and about 114 lb. The med were perfect they did look small but was easy to get on and fit great!! excited can't wait to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia DiPalo

customer_reviews.title: Expand when wet
customer_reviews.text: These pants were ok. They fit tight when not wet, but expanded to almost double the size when I went in the water. Too bad I used them and can’t return them.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Zakhvatkina

customer_reviews.title: Neoprene pants
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, good quality (especially for the price). I used for kayaking and put over my shorty for wake surfing when it was colder. It did have chemical smell when it arrived, but that went away after the first use in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Oregonian1

customer_reviews.title: great price, great fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm really liking these. great price and great fit. I got them a bit too big because I am using them for chasing small kids around in cold ocean water. They're perfect for this.
customer_reviews.author: flower

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the very reasonable price. Ordered for vacation and used during snorkeling and surfing. They were great for that purpose. The material was comfortable and was a nice weight and thickness. I ordered one size up from what I normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Celin

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than normal sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return them because they were too small. I am a size 18 pants and they did not fit. They were nice and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: These are great and for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: These are great and for a fair price. I love that it is not a full suit so I can mix and mach and fits me better due to my being short and having a smaller bottom then top.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Not a fit
customer_reviews.text: They stank of chemicals and we’re way too tight and long.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Amanda Yazdani

customer_reviews.title: EZ for Diving
customer_reviews.text: I dive in the Caribbean and these are the perfect weight. The size was true and the flexibility was perfect. I bought an extra large because I hate to struggle into my wetsuit. I washed and hung it to dry and the seems held. I would buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 8 - purchased a medium. Fits perfectly. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Suspence

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the product- unless your butt is completely flat there ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the product- unless your butt is completely flat there is no room for it! I used these for hiking in Zion in the Narrows. I had to keep picking them up, they were not very comfortable- i guess you get what you pay for they are cheap and awkward fitting. They did keep my legs from freezing however.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: want to kayak into winter?  these will help
customer_reviews.text: snug but nice, definitely prolong my kayak season! can't beat the price. Don't like the smell? Hang them outside for a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: 5' tall, 110 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: 5' tall, 110 lbs. slender. good fit. warm in water.
customer_reviews.author: N. K.

customer_reviews.title: These work very well in keeping your legs warm under ...
customer_reviews.text: These work very well in keeping your legs warm under water, unlike the top I ordered thinking it would be made with the same material.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lemberger

customer_reviews.title: These were really warm & good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These were really warm & good quality for the price. Bought these to raft in the spring & fall in WV, about 50 degree weather & I wasn’t cold at all. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sydneymw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love having a two-piece wetsuit (jacket and pants). The thickness of this pants works fine in Hawaii. It's a great protection from the sun and rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna from CA

customer_reviews.title: Great wetsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use it all the time with my paddle board.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Maxey

customer_reviews.title: I love these wetsuit pants. Love the design and love the fit.  Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and the fit of these wet suit pants. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: LMJ

customer_reviews.title: NOT true to size!!! very small!
customer_reviews.text: I am 184 lb 5'7 and got the xxl . it was way too small! I couldn't even get it on. It also has a really strong smell. will return.
customer_reviews.author: Tova Naiman

customer_reviews.title: Good price and product
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, very happy and glad I had them when I fell off my paddle board in early spring water that was really cold.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice to swim in during the colder months. I typically wear size 6 and I bought medium. The fit was good
customer_reviews.author: Andi B...

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it but glad I ordered a bigger size or it would have been way too tight. Otherwise, like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Roe

product_meta.title: DIVE & SAIL Women's 1.5mm Neoprene Wetsuit Pants Diving Snorkeling Scuba Surf Canoe Pants
feature_bullets: Should fit snug, but not too tight
1.5 mm ultra soft and super stretch neoprene, comfortable flat stitch construction gives you a soft and comfortable fit
Premium lightweight neoprene prevents water from coming in and out, increase warmth and decrease weight
Excellent stretch and recovery fabrics, form-fitting design reduces drag in water provides you a free movement without restriction
Provides UV protection and defense against sea lice, jellies and other biological irritants
